description: We've all gotten to know a little bit about Riley by watching his double jack off War Chest video with his buddy Jameson. Watching these two friends was so entertaining as we could only imagine what was going through their minds as they enjoyed an experience together and shared one with us. I think Riley is so adorable and I think somewhere in that devilish little head of his, he's quite the curious one. I continue to work my magic on Riley in hopes that before long, maybe even this trip, he'll decide to cross the line. I have a theory about this one and what I believe is that he's thoroughly enjoying the tease, but eventually it'll get the best of him and he'll dive headfirst into someone else's crotch. Time will tell. For now, take some alone time with Riley and see just how fucking hot this little teaser can be.
title: Riley, Scene #01
